com.atakmap.android.layers

Class OnlineLayersDownloadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.layers.OnlineLayersDownloadManager

  • public class OnlineLayersDownloadManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles selecting an area to download and downloading the tiles
